com.xtend.coap.utils

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xtend.coap.utils.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for CoAP Message Options as defined in rfc7252, section 12.2 and draft-ietf-core-observe-14, section 2.
    Version:
    Xtend-CoAP_v1.0.
    Author:
    César Estebas Gómez.
